description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Ice motor cyclists race on the synthetic ice track; President Nixon in Germany; Siemens electrical engineering firm; "The History and Development of Photo-Montage" exhibition; ceramic production at Hohr; Grenzhausen; theatre scenic artist Ita Maximowna; the election of a new Federal President and Gustav Willhelm Heinemann was elected for the next five years.
